text: haey anak( mou ham meat) nung kheunh mea la ai kat now ptth choumvinh a r sh daoy puokke leukatamkeung cheamuoynung kar sarsaer champoh mcheasa robsa puokke . haey ke( a l laoh) ban katsechakdei rveang puokke daoy you tde thmr . haey mean ke niyeay tha real kar sarsaer ku champoh a l laoh chea mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa
